name: One pair of lidded and mounted bowls
description: One pair of lidded and mounted bowls; Mounts attributed to Wolfgang Howzer (Swiss, active 1660 - about 1688); London, England; porcelain about 1650 - 1680; mounts about 1680; Hard-paste porcelain, underglaze blue decoration with gilt-metal mounts; 34.4 x 38.1 x 25.6 cm (13 9/16 x 15 x 10 1/16 in.); 85.DI.178.2; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
